mapper.insert: insert into work (work_name, sd_name, stu_id, teacher_Name, warn, type, details,time,states) values (#{workName}, #{sdName}, #{stuId}, #{teacherName}, #{warn}, #{type}, #{details},#{time},#{states})
mapper.select: select w.id,w.time,w.work_name,st.sd_name ,st.sd_id,t.teacher_name ,w.warn ,w.states,w.type from work w , student s , studentdetails st , teacher t where w.stu_id = s.stu_id and w.stu_id = st.stu_id and s.stu_id = st.stu_id and s.tid = t.teacher_id order by w.time desc;
mapper.update: update work set states=#{states} where id =#{id}
update work set states=#{states} where id =#{id}
